CHANGELOG
=========

06/07/09:
  - [sources/parser] Support for XRef streams. 
                     Support for Object streams creation. 
                     Support for PNG stream predictor functions.
  - [sources/scripts/scan] Added a scanning script.
  - [sources/scripts/antivir] Added an cleaning script.
  - [sources/scripts/metadata] Metadata printer.
  - [sources/samples/open] Various methods to trigger an action at the document opening.

19/06/09:
  - [sources/scripts/crypto]  Added an encryption script.
  - [sources/parser] Bugfix in Array handling.
